query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHK, T.PSPID, T.POSID, T.INSLFN , T.INSLFN2, T.ZSITE_NM, T.ZZLIFNR , T.GBN, T.FLAG FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT , A.PSPID, A.POSID, B.LIFNR, B.NAMET,B.NAMET2, A.INSLFN AS INSLFN, A.INSLFN AS INSLFN2, (SELECT G.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS G WHERE A.MANDT = G.MANDT AND A.PSPID= G.POSID) AS ZSITE_NM, E.NAME1 AS ZZLIFNR, A.GBN, CASE WHEN A.INSLFN = B.LIFNR THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FLAG, VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_AFQ' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , 0) AS AFQ, --Ãþ¼ö VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_EHTH' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , 0 ) AS EHTH, -- Àü¼þ VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_DCARIL' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , '' ) AS DCARIL, VALUE( (SELECT X.VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND A.POSID = X.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_DCWRIL' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) , '' ) AS DCWRIL
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1401 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID AND A.POSID = B.POSID_1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS E ON B.MANDT = E.MANDT AND B.LIFNR = E.LIFNR
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT# AND A.GBN = #GBN# AND A.CONF = '' AND A.ECKEY = ''
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND A.INSLFN = #LIFNR#
AND B.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
) AS T WHERE T.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND ( T.AFQ >= 10 OR (T.AFQ <10 AND T.EHTH >= 35000 ) ) AND NOT (T.DCARIL = 'Y' AND T.DCWRIL = 'Y')
